Who am I?


I am a 2nd year Computer Science student at Purdue University. My concentration lies in the field of Machine Intelligence and I am completing a minor in Mathematics to complement it. If you don’t see me coding or proving theorems, I am probably playing Cricket or Soccer, lifting at the gym, or watching Game of Thrones.

What’s going on this semester?

Currently, I am working as an undergraduate researcher in Georgia Tech’s DILAC
